_header: What man can perceive that women be evil
Note: For two similar poems see 406 and 4967.
_description: Richard Hatfield, a punctuation poem against women — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd17492.First Lines:
What man can perceyve that women be evylleuery man that hathe wytt
                    gretly wyll them prayse…
BLAdd17492.Last Lines:
…meknes & all vertue they practyse euersyn to avoyde
                    vertues they do procure
